TopicTitle: What neat leftovers are orbiting your systems?

Articles.Content:
I just noticed this little piece of junk I left in a low Tylo orbit is actually a fully functional satellite with propellant and everything!

What kind of neat things are floating around your game that you once cast off as trash?

I found half a space station orbiting Eve a few days ago. I must have put it up there in 0.19 and completely forgotten about it.

I've decided to finish it off and add a shiny new Cupola Module as the centrepiece.
These two nuclear boosters i left behind in Duna Orbit. Once resource collection is implemented they are going to be reused.
